sentences.sContent: ...a government decision earlier this month to deport all illegal immigrants.
sentences.sCn: …本月早些时候政府一项驱逐所有非法移民的决定。

remMethod.val: de(离开) + port(港口) → 驱逐出境

trans.tranOther: to make someone leave a country and return to the country they came from, especially because they do not have a legal right to stay
